name: High performance computing - Reports
body:
## Welcome to High performance computing reports.

¡¡Currently the site is under construction!!

Corner of reports prepared for the class of HPC given in the wonderful Universidad tecnológica de Pereira.
Each report will be posted here.
I hope it is helpful for those like me started in this intricate but interesting way of parallelization.
The whole code is in c ++ with support from the opencv library and the work environment cuda.

### Matrix multiplication.

###### Shared memory

By Daniel Diaz Giraldo.
